Title: Dokku Demo 2: Uploading and Automatic Deployment
Description:
I initialize git on my project and push my project to the magic dokku remote.

Dokku will accept the folder name as a new subdomain name, auto-detect which buildpack to use and compile and deploy the project.

For the Heroku node.js buildpack, the default behaviour is to start the project using npm start which we have set up in step 1
